title: Mushroom and spinach lasagne
ingredients: ['450g lasagne sheets', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '225g mushrooms, sliced', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '1 courgette, finely chopped', '900g passata or crushed tomatoes', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 pinch dark soft brown sugar', 'salt to taste', '280g frozen spinach, thawed', '450g cottage cheese', '2 eggs', '3 tablespoons dried basil, divided', '20g grated Parmesan cheese', '450g grated mozzarella cheese']
